translation.en: Can you tell me about your dating history?
translation.es: ¿Cómo te ha ido con las citas?

translation.en: My dating history?
What? Oh, I don't have any. What?
Is that a serious question?
I've never been on a date before.
Something always seems to either go wrong
or… kind of trigger my flight reflex.
translation.es: Algo siempre sale mal o… de alguna forma, activa mi reacción de huida.

translation.en: I never had a girlfriend, not even when I was in high school.
translation.es: Nunca he tenido novia, ni siquiera en la secundaria.

translation.en: I'm on my quest for true love, and I cannot give up on that.
translation.es: Busco el amor verdadero y no puedo rendirme.

translation.en: Finding love can be hard for anyone.
translation.es: Encontrar el amor puede ser difícil.

translation.en: You don't force love. You just let it come to you.
translation.es: El amor no se fuerza, debes dejar que llegue a ti.

translation.en: I'll remember that. Thanks.
And for some people, it can feel like an impossible dream.
translation.es: Y para algunas personas puede parecer algo inalcanzable.

translation.en: I'm 30, and I thought I would've had a girlfriend by now.
translation.es: Tengo 30 años y siempre pensé que ya tendría novia.

translation.en: Wow! Holy shit!
This series follows young adults on the autism spectrum…
translation.es: Esta serie sigue a adultos jóvenes en el espectro autista…

translation.en: Say hello to my future husband or wife.
translation.es: Saluden a mi futuro esposo o esposa.

translation.en: Hello, there.
…as they navigate the confusing world of relationships and dating.
translation.es: mientras navegan por el confuso mundo de las relaciones y las citas.

translation.en: - What's your age limit? - Seventy.
From first dates…
Just I'm trying to, um, make up conversation.
It seems that she only would like to see me again as a friend.
translation.es: Parece que solo le interesa una relación de amistad.

translation.en: …to the first sparks of romance…
- I've never been kissed by a girl. - Have you?
translation.es: Nunca me había besado una chica.

translation.en: She's perfect. Absolutely perfect.
…and happily ever after.
Welcome back, ladies and gentlemen.
This is series two of Love on the Spectrum.
translation.es: Es la segunda temporada de Amor en el Espectro.

translation.en: I don't really need to introduce myself because you al-- already know who I am.
translation.es: No necesito presentarme, porque ya saben quién soy.

translation.en: Michael, of course.
- Are you glad to be back, Michael? - Yes, I am. Definitely.
translation.es: - ¿Te alegra estar de nuevo aquí? - Sí. Definitivamente.

translation.en: And why are you back?
I'm continuing my-- my quest for true love.
translation.es: Continúo con mi búsqueda del amor verdadero.

translation.en: And you're just as keen to find someone special?
I don't feel any-- any less keen than what I did last year.
translation.es: No me siento menos entusiasmado que el año pasado.

translation.en: In fact, if anything, it's kinda strengthened.
I just can't bear the thought of being single my entire life
translation.es: No tolero la idea de estar soltero toda la vida,

translation.en: because it's lonely. It's boring, and it's also unfulfilling.
translation.es: porque es solitario, aburrido y también insatisfactorio.

translation.en: And it makes you feel like you lack a purpose.
translation.es: Me hace sentir que no tengo un propósito.

translation.en: I can't see myself without a wife.
translation.es: No me imagino sin una esposa.

translation.en: There's no other way for me.
Michael lives with his family in Wollongong, New South Wales.
translation.es: Michael vive con su familia en Wollongong, Nueva Gales del Sur.

translation.en: Michael, can you open the jar for me?
- Yep. - Adam shut it too tight. Thanks.
Thank you.
I've been ignored by a lot of girls throughout my life,
translation.es: En mi vida, muchas chicas me han ignorado.

translation.en: and honestly, it's no fun.
If they're not interested, they're not interested.
translation.es: Si no están interesadas, no puedes hacer nada.

translation.en: - Yeah. - What do you expect them to do?
- Nothing. - That's right.
So you've just gotta keep searching.
- Not every girl's gonna be interested. - No.
translation.es: - No le interesarás a todas las chicas. - No.

translation.en: I think you should continue with your online dating.
translation.es: Deberías seguir con las citas por internet.

translation.en: I don't think it's the answer for me.
translation.es: No creo que sea lo mejor para mí.

translation.en: Right now, maybe you feel that way because you've had no success with it,
translation.es: Tal vez ahora te sientes así porque no has tenido éxito,

translation.en: but I wouldn't close the door to it.
translation.es: pero no me cerraría a la posibilidad.

translation.en: Well, in 2018, I gave eHarmony 12 chances.
translation.es: Bueno, el 2018 probé 12 veces los sitios de citas por internet.

translation.en: One chance per month.
What if it was the 13th month that you would've--
translation.es: ¿Y si el mes 13 ibas a conocer…?

translation.en: - There is no 13th month. -
translation.es: No existe el mes 13, un año solo tiene 12.

translation.en: - There's only 12 months in a year. - I know.
translation.es: No existe el mes 13, un año solo tiene 12. Lo sé, pero si hubieras seguido adelante

translation.en: But if you kept going,
translation.es: Lo sé, pero si hubieras seguido adelante

translation.en: and on the 13th month that you were with eHarmony--
translation.es: y en el decimotercer mes de intentarlo…

translation.en: Mom, I decided if I didn't have any success by the end of the year,
translation.es: Mamá, decidí que si luego de un año no tenía éxito,

translation.en: I would not continue my profile.
Okay.
That was a waste of $240. I'm not doing that again.
translation.es: Fue un desperdicio de dinero, no volveré a hacerlo.

translation.en: Because after all, I still have a house to save for.
translation.es: Porque, además, estoy ahorrando para una casa.

translation.en: And I'm not gonna be able to buy it at this rate.
translation.es: Y si sigo así, no podré comprarla.

translation.en: I know. It all counts.
Spending $200 on something valuable, like a crystal, for example,
translation.es: Pero gastar 200 dólares en algo valioso, como un cristal,

translation.en: that's something I'm actually cool with.
Hello, I'm Ronan.
I'm 21 years of age.
Nice to meet you, Ronan.
Pleasure.
Tell me a bit about yourself.
So I would describe myself as a kind,
translation.es: Me describiría como un hombre amable,

translation.en: generous, helpful, polite man to every people.
translation.es: generoso, servicial y educado con todas las personas.

translation.en: And what does autism mean for you? Like, how does autism affect you?
translation.es: ¿Qué significa el autismo para ti? ¿Cómo te afecta?

translation.en: Sometimes I might have a bit of confusion,
translation.es: A veces me confundo un poco

translation.en: and sometimes I might need a lot of help and support.
translation.es: y a veces necesito mucha ayuda y apoyo.

translation.en: - Have you ever been in love? - I've never been in love before.
translation.es: - ¿Alguna vez te has enamorado? - Nunca he estado enamorado.

translation.en: Really, like, it's just like my own-- it's my destiny.
translation.es: Pero, en realidad, es como… Es mi destino o algo así.

translation.en: Like, really wanna find a girl that truly cares about me and loves me.
translation.es: Quiero encontrar una chica que se preocupe por mí y me ame.

translation.en: My dream girl would be, like-- like, wonderful and-- and splendid.
translation.es: La chica de mis sueños sería maravillosa y espléndida.

translation.en: Like, she might have musical talents, like as much as I do.
translation.es: Y quizá tenga talento musical, igual que yo.

translation.en: That was very nice. You're good at that.
You'll be able to impress a lady with that, I reckon.
translation.es: Podrías impresionar a una chica así.

translation.en: Yeah, I would be able to impress a lady.
translation.es: Sí, podría impresionar a una chica.

translation.en: Ronan lives with his parents and his older brother.
translation.es: Ronan vive con sus padres y su hermano mayor.

translation.en: Should I play something now?
- Yeah, get Jordan to play something. - He's good on the piano.
translation.es: Sí, que Jordan toque algo. Es bueno con el piano.

translation.en: - He'd be terrible. -
- Would he? Do you think so? -
He hasn't even played piano before.
No, but it's nice for me because I've got two sons with different skills.
translation.es: No, pero eso es bueno para mí. Tengo hijos con habilidades diferentes.

translation.en: - Yeah, different skills. - Yeah.
So what do you think about Ronan's desire to meet someone?
translation.es: ¿Qué opinas de que Ronan quiera conocer a alguien?

translation.en: I think it's great. I think this is the next phase in his life, really.
translation.es: Es genial. Creo que es la siguiente fase de su vida.

translation.en: I mean, we've got through school and now found some employment,
translation.es: Ya pasamos por la escuela, encontró un empleo

translation.en: and I think this is something that, you know, is really important to him.
translation.es: y creo que esto es algo muy importante para él.

translation.en: I'll do whatever it takes to find a girlfriend.
translation.es: Haré lo que sea para encontrar una novia.

translation.en: He's caring. He's kind. He's compassionate. He makes us laugh.
translation.es: Es cariñoso, es amable, es compasivo, nos hace reír.

translation.en: He's come a long way.
All of us in the family never dreamed that he would be at the stage he is now.
translation.es: Como familia, nunca pensamos que llegaría a la etapa en la que está ahora.

translation.en: We thought that he will be, most of the time, just wanting to be on his own,
translation.es: Creíamos que la mayoría del tiempo querría estar solo,

translation.en: um, because when he was younger, that's pretty much what he wanted to do.
translation.es: porque eso era lo que quería cuando era más joven.

translation.en: So the fact that now he'd like to have that special person
translation.es: Y que ahora quiera tener a alguien especial

translation.en: that, you know, he can turn to--
I mean, he's come this far, which is amazing,
translation.es: Si llegó hasta aquí, lo cual es increíble,

translation.en: so there's no reason why he can't.
translation.es: no veo por qué no podría hacerlo.

translation.en: When I do find a girlfriend, I just hope that,
translation.es: Cuando encuentre una novia, espero que luego de que la conozca más,

translation.en: by the time I get to know the girl a lot more, when I become older,
translation.es: espero que luego de que la conozca más, cuando la conozca y cuando crezca,

translation.en: I might-- I might get married to the girl,
and I might live in a--
I might live in a house of my own with the girl.
translation.es: Podría vivir en mi propia casa con la chica.

translation.en: Okay.
Are you gonna be nervous when Ronan goes on his first date?
translation.es: ¿Estarás nerviosa cuando vaya a su primera cita?

translation.en: Of course!
I've been nervous all my life…
translation.es: Toda la vida me he puesto nerviosa

translation.en: …with everything that Ronan takes on.
- You know what you do every single time? - What?
You amaze me and surprise me how well you cope
translation.es: Me asombras y me sorprendes con lo bien que te las arreglas

translation.en: and how well you manage all the new things you do.
translation.es: y con lo bien que manejas todas las cosas nuevas que haces.

translation.en: Yeah.
So I've kind of learned over the years
translation.es: Así que con los años aprendí

translation.en: not to worry so much, because I know you're gonna be fine.
translation.es: a no preocuparme tanto, porque sé que estarás bien.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Mm- hmm.
Yeah, I'm always gonna be fine.
The main thing I want is for you to find the right person.
translation.es: Lo que más me importa es que encuentres a la persona indicada.

translation.en: Do you wanna go and put some place mats out, and we'll go have some lunch?
translation.es: ¿Puedes ir a poner la mesa para que podamos almorzar?

translation.en: Do you think he's a good role model to learn off
translation.es: ¿Crees que es un buen modelo a imitar

translation.en: when he's dating his girlfriends, or do you think you could do it better?
translation.es: cuando sale con sus novias o crees que lo harías mejor?

translation.en: I make too many jokes, I think. I make too much fun of them.
translation.es: Creo que hago muchos chistes y me burlo de ellas.

translation.en: But I would do the right thing and make it all positive.
translation.es: Pero yo haría lo correcto y sería muy positivo.

translation.en: Hmm. That's right. You would. Any girl will be lucky to have you.
translation.es: Sí, lo sé, la chica que sea tu novia será muy afortunada.

translation.en: And I hope she likes chicken.
And I sure hope that she likes meatballs, sausages and pizza as well.
translation.es: Y espero que también le gusten las albóndigas, las salchichas y la pizza.

translation.en: When I see my brother hanging out with his girlfriend,
translation.es: Cuando vi a mi hermano salir con su novia,

translation.en: it made me feel jealous. Like thinking…
Why does he get a girlfriend and not me?
translation.es: ¿por qué él tiene novia y yo no?

translation.en: Hmm. Well, I'm sure you'll have a girlfriend one day.
translation.es: Seguro que algún día tendrás novia.

translation.en: Yeah, hopefully is all I can say.
translation.es: Eso espero, es todo lo que puedo decir.

translation.en: This is my bedroom.
There's, like, a lot of pictures around me, like V8 Supercars pictures.
translation.es: Tengo muchas fotos a mi alrededor de superautos V8.

translation.en: And even the bedsheet, it's like, Born to race,
translation.es: Incluso mis sábanas dicen nacido para correr.

translation.en: which includes the drivers. Like, they were born to race.
translation.es: Y eso incluye a los pilotos, porque ellos nacieron para correr.

translation.en: For instance, Shane van Gisbergen.
He's good at drifting,
and he's also good at doing burnouts as well.
translation.es: y también para quemar las llantas.

translation.en: He's so crazy.
What's drifting?
Drifting is like you burn the tires and smoke billows out,
translation.es: Derrapar es como quemar las llantas y que empiece a salir humo

translation.en: and you're just like…
So do you like drifting and burnouts?
Yeah, sure do, 'cause it's-- it's so hilarious.
translation.es: Sí, por supuesto, porque es muy gracioso.

translation.en: So hilarious to watch. It makes me laugh.
translation.es: Es gracioso verlo, me hace reír.

translation.en: And then this is like a lamp.
translation.es: Y esto es como una lámpara.

translation.en: It used to be in Aladdin, the movie,
translation.es: Solía estar en Aladdín, la película.

translation.en: and sometimes if you rub it,
you get to make a wish.
Get this, for instance.
I'm rubbing.
I close my eyes and say,
I wish to get a girlfriend of mine
who likes the same interests as much as I do.
translation.es: a la que le gusten las mismas cosas que a mí.

translation.en: Sounds good. Well, hopefully it'll work.
Hopefully it will.
How do you feel about living at home with your family?
translation.es: ¿Qué te parece vivir en la casa de tus padres?

translation.en: - I don't really enjoy it that much. - Why not?
translation.es: - No me gusta tanto. - ¿Por qué no?

translation.en: Women don't like to be married to men who still live with their parents
translation.es: Las mujeres no quieren casarse con hombres que viven con sus padres.

translation.en: because it's kinda embarrassing.
I'm four years away from turning 30.
For a while, I've been feeling like I'm still a boy
translation.es: A veces siento que aún soy un niño,

translation.en: because… a boy needs-- needs his parents for company.
translation.es: porque un niño necesita la compañía de sus padres.

translation.en: A man needs a spouse.
translation.es: Un hombre necesita a su cónyuge.

translation.en: Michael is getting ready for a night of speed dating.
translation.es: Michael se prepara para una noche de citas rápidas.

translation.en: - What do you think? - Perfect.
- You excited about tonight? - Yep, definitely.
You could meet your million dollars tonight, Michael.
translation.es: Quizás conozcas a tu media naranja hoy.

translation.en: With any luck. Okay, Cian, um, how about this?
translation.es: Eso espero. Cian, ¿qué opinas de este?

translation.en: Yeah, if you think that works. Why don't you ask your mom?
translation.es: Si te gusta, claro. ¿Por qué no le preguntas a tu mamá?

translation.en: Whatever makes you feel good, just wear it.
translation.es: Si te hace sentir bien, úsalo.

translation.en: This one I feel more comfortable in anyway.
translation.es: Con este me siento más cómodo.

translation.en: You wear what you're comfortable in because that's when you're going to be at your best.
translation.es: Usa lo que te haga sentir cómodo y así podrás mostrar lo mejor de ti.

translation.en: - Yep. - So wear what you like.
Because, after all, this is Mr. A Plus' attire, anyway.
translation.es: Porque este es el atuendo del señor Excelente Partido.

translation.en: That's right.
Okay, I, uh,
translation.es: Bien. Necesitaré un poco de privacidad.

translation.en: will need a little bit of, um, privacy.
- But before I do, I've gotta fix this up. - What? What is that?
translation.es: Pero antes de vestirme, debo arreglar esto. ¿Qué cosa?

translation.en: Just little-- few hairs between the eyebrows.
translation.es: Son unos cuantos pelos entre las cejas.

translation.en: Just-- he just cracks me up.
Every time.
We talked about what he was gonna wear last night.
translation.es: Anoche hablamos sobre qué ropa usaría.

translation.en: Michael was going, Well, you don't know. I might just wear my chinos.
translation.es: Michael nos dijo: No lo sabes, tal vez vaya con pantalones deportivos.

translation.en: I'm like, Listen, Mike. Yeah, sure you will, Mike.
translation.es: Michael nos dijo: No lo sabes, tal vez vaya con pantalones deportivos. Sí, claro, Mike. Sé que usarás tu traje.

translation.en: I know you're gonna wear your suit.
translation.es: Sí, claro, Mike. Sé que usarás tu traje.

translation.en: Actually, I remember when he was 13…
translation.es: De hecho, recuerdo que cuando tenía 13 años

translation.en: He came home from school,
translation.es: volvió a casa de la escuela

translation.en: and he said, I know what I'm gonna be when I grow up.
translation.es: y me dijo: Ya sé que quiero ser cuando mayor.

translation.en: And I said, Really? And what's that?
And he goes, A gangster.
And I go, Michael, why do you wanna be a gangster?
translation.es: Entonces le pregunté por qué quería ser un gánster

translation.en: And he said, Because they can wear suits every day to work.
translation.es: y me dijo: Porque usan trajes todos los días para trabajar.

translation.en: I said, Hey, Mike, do you know what they have to do?
translation.es: Así que le pregunté: Mike, ¿sabes qué tienen que hacer?.

translation.en: And then I told him and I gave him, like, a mini job description,
translation.es: Y le dije lo que hacían, le expliqué cuál era su trabajo

translation.en: and then, he said, Oh, no, I don't think I'll be a gangster.
translation.es: y entonces me dijo: Creo que no seré un gánster.

translation.en: Done.
Well, look at you, huh?
Yep, Mr. A Plus is back.
translation.es: Sí, el señor Excelente Partido está de vuelta.

translation.en: Yep, you are. I love it.
Thanks.
- You ready for tonight? Nervous? - Yes. Not really.
Okay.
Even though it's a mainstream event.
It is. That's what you asked for.
translation.es: Lo es. Eso es lo que querías.

translation.en: - I was a bit surprised, actually. - Why?
Because I'd like to encounter some women that are not on the spectrum.
translation.es: Porque me gustaría encontrar mujeres que no estén en el espectro.

translation.en: Okay.
I wanna see what they would be like with somebody who is on the spectrum,
translation.es: Quiero ver cómo serían con alguien que está en el espectro,

translation.en: but doesn't quite seem like it.
- You just wanna see how it would work. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Solo quieres ver cómo sería. - Sí.

translation.en: But you're not opposed to dating someone on the spectrum, are you?
translation.es: ¿Pero saldrías con alguien que está en el espectro?

translation.en: - No. - You want somebody that's independent.
- Yes. - Is that right?
But also somebody who's a girl next door type.
translation.es: Busco una chica agradable y bonita.

translation.en: Oh, okay.
- I better get going. - See ya. You look wonderful.
translation.es: - Me voy. - Nos vemos. - Te ves genial. - Gracias.

translation.en: Thank you.
- Do I get a kiss? - Sure, Mom.
All right. And good luck.
- Thank you. Take care. - Yeah.
- Hope you have a good time. - I will.
translation.es: - Espero que la pases bien. - Lo haré.

translation.en: Hi.
I'm Kassandra. I'm 27, and I'm single.
translation.es: Me llamo Kassandra. Tengo 27 años y soy soltera.

translation.en: Have you ever been in love?
I don't know. I-- I know I love my family.
translation.es: No sé. Sé que amo a mi familia.

translation.en: I know I love my friends,
translation.es: Sé que amo a mis amigos,

translation.en: but I don't know what intimate love is yet.
translation.es: pero aún no sé qué es el amor íntimo.

translation.en: I've read books,
both fiction and nonfiction,
translation.es: tanto de ficción como de no ficción,

translation.en: about what love should be,
translation.es: sobre lo que debería ser el amor,

translation.en: but I don't know if I've ever been in love.
translation.es: pero no sé si he estado enamorada.

translation.en: How would you describe yourself?
Weird.
And I love being weird.
I've got a jar of teeth.   Whose teeth?
translation.es: - Tengo un frasco de dientes. - ¿De quién?

translation.en: They are my teeth and my siblings'.
translation.es: Son mis dientes y los de mis hermanos.

translation.en: I love my plush toys.
I have received a few of these from previous partners.
translation.es: Algunos de estos me los dieron exparejas.

translation.en: One of them did give me the Mewtwo to match… my Mew at the time,
translation.es: Uno de ellos me regaló a Mewtwo para que hiciera juego con mi Mew en ese momento,

translation.en: 'cause we were meant to be a set.
translation.es: porque estábamos destinados a ser un set.

translation.en: Didn't work out very well. I haven't been very lucky in love,
translation.es: Pero no funcionó, no he tenido suerte en el amor.

translation.en: but, um, I've kept them. They're a little bit precious to me.
translation.es: Pero los conservé. Son preciados para mí.

translation.en: Has anyone ever said to you, You don't look autistic?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez te han dicho que no pareces autista?

translation.en: Quite often. You can't see my brain.
translation.es: Muy a menudo, pero no puedes ver mi cerebro.

translation.en: And it's my brain that's different.
translation.es: Y mi cerebro es lo diferente.

translation.en: When you were younger, was there a point where you started
translation.es: Cuando eras más joven, ¿hubo un momento en que comenzaras a sentirte diferente?

translation.en: to feel like you were different to the other kids at school?
translation.es: ¿hubo un momento en que comenzaras a sentirte diferente?

translation.en: It would've been about grade four, maybe grade five.
translation.es: Debe haber sido cuando tenía nueve o diez años.

translation.en: I remember looking up and realizing that kids sat in groups,
translation.es: Recuerdo haber mirado a los niños y notar que se sentaban en grupos,

translation.en: but I sat on my own.
And I remember that week trying to sit in with the group,
translation.es: Y recuerdo que esa semana traté de sentarme con el grupo

translation.en: and it was awful.
And I remember that week going, I am not the same,
translation.es: Y recuerdo que esa semana me dije: soy diferente.

translation.en: and it wouldn't be for three and a half years later
translation.es: Y tres años y medio después

translation.en: for me to get diagnosed.
How did you feel when you were diagnosed?
I was happy.
Having someone tell me that,
No, this is what it is,
translation.es: No, esto es lo que ocurre

translation.en: and there are thousands of other people like you,
translation.es: y hay miles de personas que son como tú,

translation.en: it made me feel human again.
translation.es: me hizo sentir humana otra vez.

translation.en: I didn't feel completely outcast anymore.
translation.es: Ya no me sentía completamente marginada.

translation.en: I still think it's probably one of the best days of my life.
translation.es: Creo que ese fue uno de los mejores días de mi vida.

translation.en: This is my games room.
translation.es: Esta es mi sala de juegos.

translation.en: A few years back, one of our concerts, we had a Kylie Minogue theme,
translation.es: Hace años, en uno de nuestros conciertos, tuvimos de tema a Kylie Minogue

translation.en: and, uh, my sister wore this one.
I'm planning to repurpose it into a new cosplay.
translation.es: Planeo reutilizarlo en un nuevo cosplay.

translation.en: Um, I haven't decided exactly which character.
translation.es: Aún no decido para qué personaje.

translation.en: So this is one of my, um, prop daggers.
translation.es: Esta es una de mis dagas de utilería.

translation.en: I also have this one. Winter is coming.
translation.es: También tengo esta. El invierno se acerca

translation.en: It sits perfectly on me.
Cosplay is dressing up as your favorite characters
translation.es: El cosplay es disfrazarse de tus personajes favoritos

translation.en: and bringing them to life.
It helps with going into social situations.
translation.es: Me ayuda a enfrentar las situaciones sociales.

translation.en: I don't have to be me.
I can be another character,
and there's a lot less stress
on being those characters than being myself.
translation.es: ser esos personajes que ser yo misma.

translation.en: One of the biggest things I've had to learn is what people call masking,
translation.es: Algo muy importante que he aprendido es a camuflarme,

translation.en: pretending and hiding the parts of me that don't fit neurotypical society.
translation.es: fingir y esconder partes de mí que no encajan en la sociedad neurotípica.

translation.en: In a perfect world,
no, I wouldn't have to learn how to word things
translation.es: no tendría que aprender cómo decir las cosas

translation.en: so a neurotypical person doesn't find offense where there is none to be had,
translation.es: para que alguien neurotípico no se ofenda con algo que no es una ofensa.

translation.en: but we don't live in a perfect world.
translation.es: Pero no vivimos en un mundo perfecto.

translation.en: - I missed you guys. - We missed you too!
So I'm thinking of starting dating again.
translation.es: Estoy pensando en volver a tener citas.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Awesome.
What kind of person would you like to meet?
Um, someone that's kind of…
translation.es: ¿Qué tipo de persona esperas conocer? Alguien que sea…

translation.en: kind of like us, but not 100% like us.
- Yeah. - I think the same here.
Otherwise I probably would've dated one of you guys, and that would've been weird.
translation.es: Si no, saldría con una de ustedes y eso sería raro.

translation.en: But I guess definitely not clingy.
translation.es: Pero alguien que no sea demandante.

translation.en: You remember the last time I dated someone who was clingy.
They wanted to, like, text me morning and night. Like, good morning and good night every day.
translation.es: Me escribía buenos días y buenas noches todos los días.

translation.en: You just want someone to encourage your dreams,
translation.es: Buscas a alguien que te apoye y tú apoyarlo

translation.en: and you encourage theirs and push each other to your goals.
translation.es: Buscas a alguien que te apoye y tú apoyarlo para que logren sus metas.

translation.en: That would be so good.
It's just difficult to find, especially as an autistic adult.
translation.es: Es difícil de encontrar, especialmente como adulto autista.

translation.en: Like, if you tell people that outright, half the time they'll judge you
translation.es: Cuando le cuentas a la gente, la mitad de las veces te juzgan

translation.en: and think you've been keeping it secret.
I think someone who's gonna understand you.
translation.es: Creo que alguien te va a entender.

translation.en: - You need that. - Not-- not just a little bit of you.
translation.es: - Necesitas eso. - No solo una parte de ti.

translation.en: - Like, the whole you. - Whole of you.
They'd also have to, like, fit in with you guys enough.
translation.es: Y tendría que encajar con ustedes.

translation.en: They'll have to do, like, the nerd 101 test.
translation.es: Tendría que aprobar la prueba básica de nerds.

translation.en: This is gonna be good.
Like, I've got my wing person.
I've got my buddies.
- I will do it. I will find someone. - We're your cheering squad. Whoo!
translation.es: - Sí, encontraré a alguien. - Somos tu apoyo.

translation.en: When it comes to dating, what's your greatest fear?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es tu mayor miedo respecto a las citas?

translation.en: Rejection.
There's nothing more terrifying to me on this earth than a life doomed to loneliness.
translation.es: Para mí no hay nada más aterrador que una vida condenada a la soledad.

translation.en: It's almost like feeling like an abandoned toy left in the closet
translation.es: Se siente como si fueras un juguete abandonado en el armario

translation.en: while all the other toys are out being played with.
Much like how Woody was in Toy Story 4 when he was left in the closet.
translation.es: Como Woody en Toy Story 4 cuando lo dejaron en el armario.

translation.en: That's exactly how I feel a lot.
Tonight, Michael is attending a speed- dating event.
translation.es: Esta noche, Michael irá a un evento de citas rápidas.

translation.en: - Hello. - Hello.
- How are you? - Good. Yourself?
- Do you wanna take a seat? - Thank you.
- Hello. How are you? - Hello. Good. Yourself?
Well, thank you.
- My name's Amelia. - I'm Michael.
- Nice to meet you. - Likewise.
- I like the outfit. - Thanks.
I like how the tie matches the handkerchief.
translation.es: Como la corbata hace juego con el pañuelo.

translation.en: - It's actually a pocket square. - Very nice.
translation.es: - Es un pañuelo de bolsillo. - Es lindo.

translation.en: What do you do in your spare time? What do you get up to?
Voice acting or watching television.
- What sort of voice acting? - There is one I've been trying lately.
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de doblajes? - He estado ensayando un personaje. - Me gustaría oírlo.

translation.en: - Love to hear it. -
translation.es: - He estado ensayando un personaje. - Me gustaría oírlo.

translation.en: - Scooby- Dooby- Doo! - That's what I thought it was!
And there's another character. It's called Muttley.
translation.es: Tengo otro personaje. Se llama Patán.

translation.en: - That's really cool. - Yeah.
There's also, um, toy collecting, as well.
- Really? - Yeah.
- What, like vintage toys or-- ? - No. Thomas.
- The Tank Engine? - Yeah.
My little brother loves Thomas the Tank Engine.
translation.es: A mi hermanito le encanta Thomas y sus amigos.

translation.en: - How old is he, may I ask? - He is three years old.
- Ah. - He's very fond of Thomas the Tank Engine.
translation.es: Le gusta mucho Thomas, el tren.

translation.en: - I mean, who isn't? - Yeah, that's true. That's true.
- I think everyone is pretty fond of him. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Creo que a todos les gusta mucho. - Sí.

translation.en: Do you have any hobbies that you like to do besides…
Yeah, I go wakeboarding when I can get the chance.
- Wake-- wakeboarding? - It's like snowboarding, but on water.
translation.es: - ¿Wakeboard? - Es como el snowboard, pero en agua.

translation.en: - Oh. - Yeah, you get hooked on to a cable.
translation.es: Sí, te enganchan a un cable,

translation.en: And you get pulled around,
and there's different tricks and whatnot that you can do. I've got my own board--
translation.es: y puedes hacer diferentes trucos. Tengo mi tabla…

translation.en: - - All right, everyone.
- It was really nice to meet you, Michael. - Likewise, Amelia. Take care.
translation.es: - Fue un placer conocerte, Michael. - Igualmente, Amelia. Cuídate.

translation.en: - I'm Michael. - I'm Taylor.
- Nice to meet you, Taylor. - You too.
Your-- your top looks abs-- absolutely amazing.
Thank you.
- And so does your hair color. - Thank you.
I got it from my grandmother, actually.
Do you mind if I ask what year you were born?
translation.es: ¿Te molesta si te pregunto en qué año naciste?

translation.en: Uh, 1996. Two years after me.
- Really? - Yeah.
Have you traveled a lot?
I've only been to Germany and Hawaii.
translation.es: Solo he ido a Alemania y Hawái.

translation.en: How did you like it?
- I'm actually a Germanophile. - Yeah?
A Germanophile is somebody that loves German things.
translation.es: Un germanófilo es alguien que ama las cosas alemanas.

translation.en: Very nice.
I'm also a bit of an Anglophile.
- So you love English culture? - Yeah.
- What's your favorite? - Their cheeses.
translation.es: - ¿Qué es lo que más te gusta? - Sus quesos.

translation.en: And celebrities from there, as well.
translation.es: Y las celebridades de allá también.

translation.en: Rosamund Pike, Jack Davenport.
- Alice Eve, Keira Knightley. -
- John Cleese, Benedict Cumberbatch. - Yes.
All right, everyone move on to your next date.
translation.es: Muy bien, todos pasen a su próxima cita.

translation.en: All the men to the right.
I actually really enjoyed my time with you.  Thank you. I did too.
translation.es: - Disfruté mucho de mi tiempo contigo. - Yo también.

translation.en: - Hi. - Hello.
- I'm Tori. - I'm-- I'm Michael.
- Lovely to meet you.  - Likewise.
So what do you do for a living?
I am a mom.
Of a four- year- old girl named Brynne.
translation.es: De una niña de cuatro años llamada Brynne.

translation.en: - Ah. Nice. - Yeah.
- Are you a single mother? - I am a single mother.
translation.es: - ¿Eres madre soltera? - Sí, soy madre soltera.

translation.en: How does-- how does that feel?
It feels good.
Good to be out of a relationship that didn't work.
translation.es: Es bueno dejar de estar en una relación que no funcionaba.

translation.en: - That's understandable. - Yeah.
Do you watch television much?
I don't have a TV at home.
- - That sucks.
I think it's great.
Do you know much about astrology and star signs? - No, not too much. - Oh.
translation.es: - ¿Te interesa la astrología? - No, no mucho.

translation.en: - - Everyone on to their next date.
translation.es: De acuerdo, pasen a su próxima cita.

translation.en: See you. Lovely to meet you. - Likewise, Tori. Take care. -
translation.es: - Adiós, fue un placer. - Igualmente, Tori, cuídate.

translation.en: Ronan has been volunteering for three years at Sydney Motorsport Park.
translation.es: Ronan es voluntario hace tres años en el parque de automovilismo de Sídney.

translation.en: I know it's loud, but even so, it's, like, quite exciting.
translation.es: Sé que hay mucho ruido, pero, aun así, es muy emocionante.

translation.en: You hear the cars just, like, go zooming past.
translation.es: Escuchas los autos que pasan zumbando.

translation.en: Like, you're on the edge of your seat
translation.es: Y estás al borde de tu asiento,

translation.en: enjoying the wild ride.
Fifty. Yeah, I've got 50 there.
I check the drivers off in their correct position.
translation.es: Reviso que los pilotos estén en la posición correcta.

translation.en: It's like if-- if something isn't right, I-- I go over to the driver and ask.
translation.es: Y si algo no está bien, me acerco al conductor y le pregunto.

translation.en: Nah, mate, this is my spot. This is my starting position.
translation.es: No, este es mi lugar. Es mi posición inicial.

translation.en: - This is where I'm starting-- - Sorry, like, this is the law.
translation.es: - Aquí es donde empezamos - Lo siento, esto es lo que manda.

translation.en: - I cannot accept it. - I'm not moving.
Corey! Corey!
- Come quick. - Yeah.
What's the problem?
Car 351 is in the wrong position.  Well, that's where he's qualified to.
translation.es: - Esta no es la posición del auto 351. - Debe ir a su posición.

translation.en: You gotta tell him. If he doesn't go now, we are gonna call race control. Simple as that.
translation.es: Dile y si no se va, llamamos a los controladores de carrera.

translation.en: - Yeah. - All right?
Sorry, but if you don't move down, I'll have to call race control.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero si no te vas, llamaré a los controladores de carrera.

translation.en: Aww, jeez, man. All right.
Well done. Well done.
I spoke to him respectfully and said,
translation.es: Hablé con él respetuosamente y le dije:

translation.en: I'm sorry, but this grid sheet is where you need to be.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero debes estar en esta posición.

translation.en: Like, really, I showed-- I showed bravery inside me.
translation.es: En serio, demostré… valentía dentro de mí.

translation.en: I-- I just showed myself I was boss.
translation.es: Acabo de demostrarme que soy el jefe.

translation.en: - Hello.  - Hello.
- I'm Jess. - I'm Michael.
- Nice to meet you. - Nice to meet you as well.
So do you go out much?
Um, spend time with friends whenever I get the chance,
translation.es: Paso tiempo con mis amigos cada vez que puedo,

translation.en: eating out or going to the cinemas.
translation.es: salgo a comer y voy al cine.

translation.en: - What kind of food do you like? - Italian or German.
translation.es: - ¿Qué tipo de comida te gusta? - Italiana o alemana.

translation.en: German? Like schnitzels?
Schnitzels, bratwurst, kranskys.
I love food.  Tell me about it.
translation.es: - Me encanta la comida. - A mí también.

translation.en: I went on holiday a while back, and I just ate my way through the whole holiday.
translation.es: Hace un tiempo me fui de vacaciones y me dediqué a comer todos los días.

translation.en: There's so much amazing food outside of Australia.
translation.es: Hay tanta comida increíble fuera de Australia.

translation.en: - Where did you go? - I went to Europe.
Where in Europe?
I went to Germany, to England and a few other places.
translation.es: Fui a Alemania, a Inglaterra y a otros lugares.

translation.en: Ah, I'd love to visit England.
It's cold.  It's really cold.
So I've heard, yeah.
Do you have any hobbies?
I like watching movies.
- Like what? - I like horror movies.
- Oh. - Yeah.
I also like to watch a lot of thrillers and, um, psychological movies, but…
translation.es: También me gustan las películas de suspenso y psicológicas…

translation.en: - Creepy. - Yeah.
Lovely to talk to you.
- Nice to meet you too. - And meeting you as well.
- Enjoy the rest of your dates. - Thank you. Thanks.
- Good luck with the other gentlemen. - You too.
Take care.
- Hello. - Hi.
- How are you? - I'm good. Yourself?
I'm--
I'm good.
That's good. I'm Michael.
- Nice to meet you. I'm Heather. - Nice to meet you, Heather.
translation.es: - Encantada, soy Heather. - Mucho gusto, Heather.

translation.en: Do you mind if I ask what year you were born?
One year after me.
You're 26? Yep.
And, um…
Uh, try and think of a question.
My mind's at a crossroads.
Um, what are your hobbies?
Watching television shows,
spiritual activities, like meditation, maybe yoga.
translation.es: actividades espirituales como meditar y un poco de yoga.

translation.en: I also wanna start learning how to do tai chi.
- Oh, cool. - Yeah.
What about you?
I like watching Netflix.
Um, have you been overseas before? Yeah, I went to England and Germany.
translation.es: - ¿Has estado en el extranjero? - Sí, fui a Inglaterra y Alemania.

translation.en: I've been to Germany twice.
translation.es: Yo fui dos veces a Alemania.

translation.en: That's cool.
- But I'd love to visit England. - It's a beautiful place, as well.
translation.es: - Y me encantaría ir a Inglaterra. - También es hermoso.

translation.en: - Love their culture. - Yeah.
All the roast ch-- roast lamb and beef and-- yeah.
translation.es: Todos los asados… corderos asados y res. Sí.

translation.en: It's amazing.
Yeah.
And I gotta say, you look absolutely amazing.
translation.es: Y debo decir que te ves increíble.

translation.en: Thank you.
Your clothes, your glasses, your hairstyle.
translation.es: Tu ropa, tus anteojos, tu peinado.

translation.en: Thank you.
You look amazing too.
Thank you. I love dressing like this anyway.
translation.es: - También luces increíble. - Gracias. Me encanta vestirme así.

translation.en: That's cool.
Do you watch television shows much?
I'm sad to admit that I watch The Bachelor.
translation.es: Me avergüenza admitir que veo The Bachelor.

translation.en: - The Bachelor? - Yeah.
Never saw that.
The women out on there, they're horrible. Very nasty.
translation.es: Las mujeres que salen son horribles. Muy desagradables.

translation.en: Yeah. So… hmm.
I should also tell you that I'm actually on the spectrum.
translation.es: Debo decirte que estoy en el espectro.

translation.en: - Hmm. - The autism spectrum.
I'm on the spectrum too.
I know, like, all the stuff about Harry Potter… - Ah. - …Star Wars.
translation.es: Sé todo sobre Harry Potter, Star Wars.

translation.en: So I get hooked onto things easily.
- Yeah, same. - Yeah.
All right, that is it. We are done!
translation.es: Muy bien, eso es todo. Terminamos.

translation.en: Thanks for your time, Heather.
- Thank you for your time too. - No problem.
translation.es: - Gracias a ti. - No hay problema.

translation.en: - See you later. - Enjoy your night.
- Thank you. - Thanks. Good luck.
At the end of the event, the singles choose who they'd like to see again.
translation.es: Al final del evento, los solteros eligen a quién les gustaría volver a ver.

translation.en: They will only be matched if the other person also chooses them.
translation.es: Solo podrá ponerse en contacto si la otra persona también los elige.

translation.en: I've ticked Taylor and Jessica.
I'm not gonna go for Tori.
And Amelia? Not really.
translation.es: ¿Y a Amelia? La verdad es que no.

translation.en: Heather, I've ticked her as well.
- Are you happy with your decision? - Yep, definitely.
Anna, here's the list.
The lucky list!
- Thank you so much for coming. - No problem.
- I'll give you a call tonight? - Sure. Thank you.
- Take care of yourself. See ya. - You too, Michael. Bye- bye.
translation.es: - Cuídate. Nos vemos. - Tú también, adiós.

translation.en: Do you have any rules for dating?
Pay full respect to a girl.
Make eye contact.
Make sure your body language is positive.
translation.es: Asegurarse de que el lenguaje corporal sea positivo.

translation.en: Most importantly, enjoy your lovable activities together.
translation.es: Y lo más importante, disfrutar juntos las adorables actividades.

translation.en: I always want to do the right thing,
but really, like, one thing I do know,
I have heard about-- about Jodi, like, you know, Jodi, the dating coach?
translation.es: Me hablaron de Jodi. ¿Conoces a Jodi, la entrenadora de citas?

translation.en: Like, yeah, she'll…
- She'll possibly teach me a lot. - Yeah, if you wanna see her.
translation.es: - Ella podría enseñarme mucho. - Sí, si quieres verla.

translation.en: - You think that would that be helpful? - Yeah, it would be helpful.
translation.es: - ¿Te sería útil? - Sí. Sería útil porque me daría muchos consejos.

translation.en: Because then I would be given a few-- lots of tips.
translation.es: Sería útil porque me daría muchos consejos.

translation.en: Jodi Rodgers is a relationship specialist who works with autistic adults,
translation.es: Jodi Rodgers es especialista en relaciones y trabaja con adultos autistas,

translation.en: helping them in their search for love.
translation.es: ayudándoles en su búsqueda de amor.

translation.en: Hello, I'm Jodi.
- I'm Ronan. - Lovely to meet you.
- Is it okay if I come in? - Pleasure. Yeah. Definitely.
We're not born with social skills.
We are taught social skills. We're taught greetings.
translation.es: Nos las enseñan, nos enseñan a saludar.

translation.en: We're taught how to have a back- and- forth conversation.
translation.es: Nos enseñan a tener una conversación.

translation.en: - Jodi, this is my mom. - Yes.
translation.es: - Jodi, ella es mi mamá. - Sí.

translation.en: - My mom Linda. - Hi, Jodi. I'm Linda…
Some people have much more innate ability to pick up social skills quickly,
translation.es: Algunos innatamente aprenden más rápido las habilidades sociales,

translation.en: and for many autistic people, learning social skills is not easy.
translation.es: pero para muchas personas autistas, aprender habilidades sociales no es fácil.

translation.en: Here's your chair, Jodi.
Thank you.
We also have to remember that autism is as diverse
translation.es: También debemos recordar que el autismo es diverso,

translation.en: in people's need for support from others
translation.es: no solo en la necesidad de apoyo que cada uno puede necesitar

translation.en: as it is in its presentation itself.
translation.es: sino también en cómo se manifiesta.

translation.en: So what things did you want help with today?
translation.es: ¿Con qué quieres que te ayude hoy?

translation.en: 'Cause I hear that you might be going on your first date?
translation.es: Supe que podrías tener tu primera cita.

translation.en: - The first date, yeah. -
So I've never been on a date before, but--
translation.es: Nunca he tenido una cita, pero…

translation.en: but really, this is like something for me to achieve on,
translation.es: Esto realmente es algo que debo lograr,

translation.en: like a relationship as boyfriend and girlfriend.
translation.es: Esto realmente es algo que debo lograr, una relación de novio y novia.

translation.en: So when you think about having a girlfriend, what does that mean to you?
translation.es: Cuando piensas en tener una novia, ¿qué significa eso para ti?

translation.en: It means, like, I feel warm and comfortable.
translation.es: Significa que me siento cálido y cómodo.

translation.en: There's no any problems, that you're happy and calm.
translation.es: No hay ningún problema y te sientes feliz y tranquilo.

translation.en: Tell you what, I wish there was no problems.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Desearía que no hubiera problemas.

translation.en: When you have a girlfriend, there's still problems.
translation.es: Si tienes novia, aún hay problemas.

translation.en: - Still problems? - Still problems.
- Having a girlfriend's a beautiful thing. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Tener novia es algo hermoso. - Sí.

translation.en: But it doesn't make everything perfect.
translation.es: Pero no hace que todo sea perfecto.

translation.en: You have to really try with another person.
translation.es: Tienes que esforzarte con otra persona.

translation.en: It's all about looking after one another, and all of that can be really, really hard work.
translation.es: Se trata de cuidarse mutuamente y todo eso puede ser muy duro.

translation.en: - Yeah. - But it's like driving the fastest car
translation.es: Pero es como conducir el auto más rápido

translation.en: on the hardest track.
Yeah.
Would you say, No, no, I don't wanna do that because it's too hard,
translation.es: ¿Dirías: No quiero hacer eso porque es muy difícil?

translation.en: or would you be brave and give it a go?
I would be brave and give it a go.
That's just what building a relationship's like.
Yeah.
If you go on your very first date,
translation.es: Si vas a tu primera cita,

translation.en: how do you think you're gonna feel on your first date?
Well, most people would feel a bit nervous.
translation.es: La mayoría de la gente se sentiría nerviosa.

translation.en: Yeah.
But I'm brave and-- and I'm excited, like--
translation.es: Pero yo soy valiente y estoy entusiasmado, porque…

translation.en: like, doing something new and special that I've never done before.
translation.es: porque haré algo nuevo y especial que nunca antes había hecho.

translation.en: That is so excellent.
That is such a good way to think about the world.
translation.es: Una gran forma de enfrentar al mundo.

translation.en: So what do you think that you need help from me with,
if you're brave and excited?
translation.es: si te sientes valiente y entusiasmado?

translation.en: So, really, like, something for me to learn
translation.es: En realidad, algo que necesito aprender

translation.en: on having a date is, like, conversation driving,
translation.es: para tener una cita es mantener una conversación.

translation.en: as in showing a lot of interest
and you're involved, and you wanna discuss more.
translation.es: y que estás involucrado y que quieres hablar más.

translation.en: I reckon we should have a bit of a practice, you and me,
translation.es: Creo que deberíamos practicar un poco,

translation.en: just at how you'll get-- how you could keep the conversation going.
translation.es: Creo que deberíamos practicar un poco, para ver cómo podrías mantener una conversación fluida.

translation.en: Or maybe you can pretend you're going on a picnic together.
translation.es: O podrían fingir que van de picnic juntos.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Come into the kitchen.
- Is that all right? - Yeah.
So, if you and I pretend we're outside and we're actually at the picnic,
translation.es: Si tú y yo fingimos que estamos afuera y que estamos en el picnic,

translation.en: what activities will you do on the picnic?
There's, like, Frisbee.
So you have a conversation about the Frisbee with me.
- Get me in on the conversation. - Yeah.
Like, do you like playing Frisbee?
Yes.
- How about we play Frisbee together? - Oh, that'd be lovely.
translation.es: - ¿Te gustaría jugar al frisbi conmigo? - Eso sería genial.

translation.en: So it's really like-- really like throwing the ball and catching it,
translation.es: Es parecido a lanzar una pelota y atraparla,

translation.en: but instead, it's different with a Frisbee.
translation.es: pero es diferente, porque usamos un frisbi.

translation.en: Okay.
It'd be great, so…
- Can I show you something? - Yeah, um… Can I just use Mom's pen?
translation.es: ¿Puedo mostrarte algo? ¿Puedo usar el lápiz de mamá?

translation.en: - Come here with me for a sec. - Am I-- am I not paying attention?
translation.es: Ven conmigo un momento. ¿No estoy prestando atención?

translation.en: No, no, you're doing a great job. I'm so impressed with you.
translation.es: No, lo estás haciendo muy bien. Me has impresionado.

translation.en: What's that say?
That's a no.
- And what's this one say? - Yes.  All right.
When we ask people questions that finish with--
translation.es: Cuando hacemos preguntas que terminan con…

translation.en: Oh, no. It has to be, like, just what, who and how questions.
translation.es: No, tienen que ser preguntas con qué, quién y cómo.

translation.en: Now you're on it. Now you're on it.
Because if you just said to me, How would you--
- Uh, what did you say about-- ? - How'd you like to play Frisbee with me?
translation.es: - ¿Qué me dijiste de…? - ¿Te gustaría jugar al frisbi conmigo?

translation.en: Yes, I would.
Oh, no, that wasn't-- that wouldn't be enough.
It can't-- it cannot be-- it cannot be yes or no question.
translation.es: No puede… No pueden ser preguntas de respuesta sí o no.

translation.en: Has to be only what, who and how and where.
translation.es: Solo pueden ser qué, quién, cómo…

translation.en: No, no, you can definitely have yes or no,
translation.es: No, pueden ser de sí o no,

translation.en: but then if I wanted to keep you talking, what would be another question I'd ask?
translation.es: pero si quisiera que sigas hablando, ¿qué otra pregunta podría usar?

translation.en: What cars-- why don't you like Fords?
translation.es: ¿Qué autos…? ¿Por qué no te gustan los autos Ford?

translation.en: Perfect. See? You know all of those techniques.
translation.es: Eso es. ¿Ves? Conoces todas las técnicas.

translation.en: What, who, where and how and why?
translation.es: ¿Qué, quién, dónde, cómo y por qué?

translation.en: Yeah, you're brilliant at this. So now let's have another practice.
translation.es: Sí, eres muy bueno en esto. Ahora hagamos otra práctica.

translation.en: What other activities will you do on your picnic?
Maybe we could walk along the beach together.
translation.es: Podríamos caminar juntos por la playa.

translation.en: I'd love that. I love walking along the beach.
translation.es: Me encantaría. Me encanta caminar por la playa.

translation.en: So wh-- why do you like walking along the beach?
translation.es: ¿Por qué te gusta caminar por la playa?

translation.en: Now you got it.
So you don't need to worry about it.
You're a really great communicator, Ronan. Really good.
translation.es: Eres un gran comunicador, Ronan, muy bueno.

translation.en: This is just you being you.
translation.es: Solo tienes que ser tú mismo.

translation.en: I'm hanging to hear about this first date.
translation.es: Estoy ansiosa por saber de tu primera cita.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Yeah.
You're definitely gonna contact me and let me know how it goes?
translation.es: ¿Vas a contactarme y contarme cómo te fue?

translation.en: - Yeah, definitely. - Yeah.
Because I'll be having that feeling to going,
Hope it goes good. Hope it goes good. Hope it goes good.
- Yeah! -
You're gonna be brilliant.
Always.
Now, do you wanna walk me out to the door?
Yeah, definitely.
Ronan has so much to offer
because he's got so many different interests and skills
translation.es: porque tiene muchos intereses y habilidades

translation.en: that other people will find really, really appealing.
translation.es: que otras personas encontrarán muy atractivas.

translation.en: I think any girl that gets to go on a date with Ronan
translation.es: Creo que cualquier chica que tenga una cita con Ronan

translation.en: is going to be a really, really lucky girl.
- That's been a really fun afternoon. - Yeah, it was a pleasure.
translation.es: - Ha sido una tarde muy divertida. - Sí, fue un placer.

translation.en: - Thank you. - Thanks.
- Catch you later, Jodi. - See ya.
Kassandra is getting ready to step out on her first date in months.
translation.es: Kassandra se prepara para su primera cita en meses.

translation.en: Kassandra is meeting Tom.
He likes scratching a dog's itch
translation.es: A él le gusta rascar a los perros cuando les pica algo

translation.en: and playing guitar rock.
translation.es: y tocar rock con su guitarra.

translation.en: He doesn't like windy days
translation.es: No le gustan los días ventosos

translation.en: or crooked pictures on walls.
translation.es: ni las fotos torcidas en las paredes.

translation.en: - Hi, there. - Hello. How are you going?
- Good. My name's Kass. - I'm Tom.
translation.es: - Bien. Me llamo Kass. - Y yo Tom.

translation.en: - Nice to meet you, Tom. - Likewise.
You look good. I like your shirt.
Thanks. It's a shirt from a John Lennon design collection.
translation.es: Gracias. Es un diseño de John Lennon.

translation.en: - Oh, I love John Lennon. - Mm- hmm.
- Um, should we go inside? - Let's.
- Hi! - Hey.
So, um, you might be able to tell 'cause of the long hair,
translation.es: Podrás deducir por mi pelo largo,

translation.en: I really, um, I really love music.
- Mm- hmm. - So, um, yeah, so, um…
Yeah, I grew up listening to The Beatles, um, and Led Zeppelin really early,
translation.es: Sí, crecí escuchando a los Beatles y a Led Zeppelin en un comienzo

translation.en: and then I got into Queen and, um, and all-- all kind-- I've got--
translation.es: y luego me interesó Queen y tengo…

translation.en: I have all of these bands that have just influenced who I am today.
translation.es: Todas estas bandas han influenciado quién soy hoy.

translation.en: - I'm a dance teacher. - Nice.
So I listen to a lot of different styles of music as well.
translation.es: Así que escucho diferentes estilos de música.

translation.en: - Excellent. - And I've performed in musical theater.
translation.es: - Excelente. - Y he actuado en musicales.

translation.en: Okay, what have you performed in?  Uh, most recently, it was Shrek The Musical.
translation.es: - ¿En cuáles? - El más reciente fue Shrek, el musical.

translation.en: Oh, uh, in the professional cast, was it?
Um, no, it was in the community theater.
Okay, um, yeah, so we had a production of, um, Shrek The Musical at my work
translation.es: Tuvimos una producción de Shrek, el musical en mi trabajo

translation.en: a few years ago with Jay Laga'aia playing the title role.
translation.es: hace unos años con Jay Laga'aia de protagonista.

translation.en: - Oh, yeah, I came and watched that one. - Nice.
translation.es: - Sí, vine a verla. - Qué bien.

translation.en: - That's awesome. - Excellent.
I really do like your shirt. That is really cool.
translation.es: Me encanta tu camisa. Es genial.

translation.en: Yeah, I've got a-- I've got, um, two more John Lennon- designed shirts.
translation.es: Sí, tengo dos camisas más diseñadas por John Lennon.

translation.en: Um, I could've worn one of them.
Unfort-- unfortunately, um, this-- Actually, this one-- start that one again.
translation.es: Lamentablemente… De hecho, esta… Voy a empezar de nuevo.

translation.en: So, um, this one, uh, was probably the best one, uh, for me to choose.
translation.es: Probablemente esta fue la mejor opción para mí.

translation.en: - Awesome. Well, it looks good. - Mm- hmm. Thanks. Mm- hmm.
translation.es: Genial. Sí, se ve bien. Gracias.

translation.en: Um, yeah, so…
So, um, so what's the dress you're wearing there?
Um, it's from Princess Highway. It's, um, the Musgrave Bunny dress.
translation.es: Es de la marca Princess Highway. Es el vestido Musgrave Bunny.

translation.en: Ah, yeah.
My mom likes to get a lot of clothes for me that are alternative fashion.
translation.es: A mi mamá le gusta comprarme mucha ropa alternativa.

translation.en: - Okay. - Um…
- Yeah. - Mm- hmm.
Would-- would you like to get a drink?
- Yeah, okay. - Nice.
What do you do for, I guess, fun?
Um, I-- I, um, I generally, um--
What I've been doing is, um, sorting out all of my family's music collections,
translation.es: He estado ordenando la colección musical de mi familia,

translation.en: both, uh, digitally at the moment,
and I'm doing our vinyl records and CDs at the moment too.
One of the records that I've been listening to quite a bit
translation.es: Uno de los discos que he escuchado bastante

translation.en: is, um, OK Computer by Radiohead.
Okay, I didn't think they'd have records.
translation.es: Qué bien. No sabía que tenían discos.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Wow.
- That's really cool. Sorry. - That's all right.
translation.es: - Eso es genial. Lo siento. - Está bien.

translation.en: - Um, I'm just a bit nervous. - Um, yeah.
So I-- I'm just, um-- just a little bit tri-- trippy.
Just, um, I'm trying to, um, make up conversation.
That's all right. Um, I haven't been on a first date in a while.
translation.es: Está bien. Hace mucho que no tenía una cita.

translation.en: That's all right.
So…
You okay, Kassandra?
I'm struggling a little bit with what to talk about.
translation.es: Me está costando un poco encontrar temas de conversación.

translation.en: Um, I think I'm actually on the verge of a bit of a panic attack,
translation.es: Creo que estoy al borde de una crisis de pánico,

translation.en: so I might need to take a break, if that's okay, soon.
translation.es: así que necesitaré un receso, si no te molesta.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, of course.
I don't know if it's because it's been a really long week for me.
translation.es: No sé si es porque he tenido una semana muy larga.

translation.en: I might find the bathrooms.
Of course. Of course. Do whatever you need to do.
translation.es: Por supuesto, haz lo que tengas que hacer.

translation.en: Hey.
- Um, sorry about that. - That's all right.
Um, I've actually started having a panic attack.
translation.es: Empecé a tener una crisis de pánico.

translation.en: - Oh, sh-- okay. You okay? - Yeah. I just, um…
translation.es: Mier… ¿Estás bien? Sí, es solo que…

translation.en: Is it okay if, like… I go?
- That's all right. - Um…
- Is there anything I can do for you? - Um, no.
translation.es: - ¿Hay algo que pueda hacer por ti? - No.

translation.en: No worries, Kass.
- Nice to meet you. - Likewise.
- Okay, thank you. - No worries.
- Okay. -
- Hey, Mom. - Oh, Mike.
- Hi, Dad. - How are you doing?
- Good. Yourself? - How did you go?
- Very well. - Come and take a seat.
- Sure. Okay. - I wanna hear everything.
translation.es: - Claro. - Cuéntamelo todo. - Bien. - Cada detalle.

translation.en: Every detail.
There were five women, of course.
And only one of them was on the spectrum, of course.
translation.es: Solo una estaba en el espectro, claro.

translation.en: - Oh, was it? Okay. - Yeah, her name's Heather.
translation.es: - ¿En serio? Bien. - Sí, se llama Heather.

translation.en: Right. Did you tick Heather?
Yes, I also ticked two other girls named Jessica and Taylor.
translation.es: Sí y también elegí a otras dos chicas llamadas Jessica y Taylor.

translation.en: And so do you think any of them liked you?
translation.es: ¿Y crees que le gustaste a alguna de ellas?

translation.en: - I think they do. - Yeah?
But I'm gonna get a call pretty soon about what matches I got.
translation.es: Pero pronto me llamarán para avisarme si me eligieron.

translation.en: Ooh, that's exciting. Are you excited?
- Yes, I hope Taylor will be one of them. - I'm excited! You hope Taylor?
translation.es: Espero que Taylor me haya elegido. - ¿Taylor? - Sí.

translation.en: - Yeah. -
Hello.
Hi, Michael. It's Anna. I'm calling from speed dating.
translation.es: Hola, Michael. Soy Anna, de las citas rápidas.

translation.en: Yes.
You have a match. I'm very excited.
- And it's Heather. - Yes! Yes!
And I'll give you her mobile number. Have you got a pen there?
translation.es: Te daré su número. ¿Tienes un lápiz?

translation.en: - I'll get one. - Yes.
- Is-- was she my only match? - She's your only match tonight.
translation.es: - ¿Fue mi única coincidencia? - Sí, fue la única.

translation.en: - Oh. - Exciting, Michael.
Yeah, and some people go to speed dating, and they get no matches, so I was very excited for you.
translation.es: Algunos no tienen coincidencias, así que estoy muy contenta por ti.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Oh, yeah.
Thank you.
- That's exciting! - Okay. All right, Michael.
- Have a great night. Bye- bye. - Take care.
translation.es: Bien, Michael, buenas noches. - Cuídate. - Adiós.

translation.en: Aww, that's so good.
- So, high five. - Thanks.
- Thanks, Mom. - Very good.
Well done, Mike, and who knows what the future holds.
translation.es: Bien hecho, Mike, y quién sabe qué depara el futuro.

translation.en: Just a matter of time. It's about getting to know one another.
translation.es: Solo es cuestión de tiempo y de conocerse.

translation.en: - Just see what happens. - Hmm.
That's what a tuba sounds like.
It's hard to make a tuba sound really good on its own, isn't it?
translation.es: Es difícil hacer que la tuba suene muy bien sola, ¿no?

translation.en: But when it's in the band, it sounds really good.
translation.es: - Pero en la banda suena muy bien. - ¿Qué banda?

translation.en: - Which band? - I play in the Sutherland Shire band.
translation.es: - Pero en la banda suena muy bien. - ¿Qué banda? Toco en la banda de Sutherland Shire.

translation.en: Cool. You do so many things, Ronan.
- Sure do. -
Are you gonna have time for a girlfriend?
Hopefully.
I think you'll have to make time for the girlfriend, won't you?
translation.es: Tendrás que hacerte tiempo para tu novia.

translation.en: Make time?
Well, you have to, otherwise you would never see each other.
translation.es: Sí, de lo contrario nunca se verían.

translation.en: It's a special day for Ronan.
translation.es: Es un día especial para Ronan.

translation.en: He's getting ready to step out on his first- ever date.
translation.es: Se prepara para tener su primera cita.

translation.en: How you feeling, Ronan?
Feeling excited.
I'm always well prepared
to look very presentable.
Almost as in tip- top shape.
- Big day. - It's a big day.
translation.es: - El gran día. - Es un gran día.

translation.en: He's confident. He doesn't get nervous.
translation.es: Él es muy seguro, no se pone nervioso.

translation.en: It's all just gonna depend on that conversation
and keeping the conversation going.
It's very exciting, very proud of him.
translation.es: Es emocionante, estoy orgullosa de él.

translation.en: I'm all ready.
- Okay. So you've done everything? - I've done everything.
- Checked everything off? - Checked everything off.
- Yeah, and feeling good? - Feeling good, yeah.
translation.es: - ¿Y te sientes bien? - Me siento bien.

translation.en: Okay, let's just make sure before we close that up.
- Yep. - What have you got?
I've got chocolate, sandwiches and strawberries.
Excellent. All right. So we can close that up.
All right.
What do you think she's gonna be like, Ronan?
Maybe she'll be like a-- a lovely lady.
translation.es: Tal vez será una dama encantadora.

translation.en: That would be perfect for you, wouldn't it?
Exactly.
- Gonna open the door up here for you. - Yep.
- Off you go. Have a wonderful day. -
translation.es: Eso es. Que tengas un día maravilloso.

translation.en: - Sure will.  - I'm so excited for you.
translation.es: - Lo será. - Estoy emocionada por ti.

translation.en: - Bye, sweetheart. - See ya, Mom!
- Have a great day! Bye. - See ya. See ya.
Now I'm nervous.
